channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree stump cause damage to pavement, 29th March
item.description:
The tree was cut down over 12 months ago and the stump has remained with barriers around it. The stump is continuing to cause damage to the pavement maki mg it unsafe and also the barriers which are in place are consistently falling over and adding the the obstruction making access for the elderly and children unsafe

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Bournside Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Tree stump blocking access to residents drive, 29th March
item.description:
A tree was cut down over a year ago as it was leaning and blocking access to a residents drive. The couple who live at the property are elderly and rely on access for their car. Although the tree has gone the stump has remained for over 12 months and given the height has made it even more difficult for the residents to avoid as it is harder to see when manoeuvring the car

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Bournside Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Tree stump causing obstruction and damage to pavement, 29th March
item.description:
This tree was cut down over 12 months ago and the stump has gradually been falling and causing damage to the pavement making it uneven. Barriers and cones have been placed around it and are constantly blowing over causing additional obstructions. I can see this has previously been reported and the case has been closed without resolution

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Bournside Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Remove sign post and relocate sign to No.24 light post., 29th March
item.description:
This is a repeat report on a sign post placed in the cycle lane. This is a hazard on this well used Up Hatherley cycleway to get to and from shops. I suggest relocatibg the sign on to No24 light post. See recent photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westside Mobile Home Park, The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked for months!! Water doesn’t drain away at all even when rain stops! At its worse it spills onto my driveway and I’m very concerned it will encroach on my property., 28th March
item.description:
Directly out 27 and 29 Binyon Road Winchcombe and the opposite side of road outside 13 and 15 Binyon Road. Been a problem for a long time but now is very concerning

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Binyon Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Culvert blocked, 28th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury

item.title: Multiple large and deep potholes along Elmleaze, 28th March
item.description:
Multiple potholes from top of Elmleaze all the way through to Nine Elms (junction by Grey Hound Pub). Largest two are outside 88 and 89 Elmleaze. It would take me hours upon hours to report every pothole on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmleaze, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A very large collection of water outside the buildings, and the grass verges now just completely impassable and is just now dangerous slippy mud. A huge struggle to access the buildings due to this collection of water, which does not drain away for days at a time., 28th March
item.description:
No possible way for water to drain, the path is raised and sunk in many areas. Large collection of water making a pavement impassable and having to either walk around on the road or getting very muddy onto the verge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Pittville Lawn, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Drain blocked., 28th March
item.description:
Drain blocked. Not draining surface water away. Water is a small lake across the entrance to Whitelands Lane & on the tactile pavement for pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitelands Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
